name: Illusion
short-desc: Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokemon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.
long-desc: This Pokemon, upon being sent out, appears to have the species, nickname, and PokÃ© Ball of the last Pokemon in the party that is able to battle.  This illusion breaks upon being hit by a damaging move.  Other damage, e.g. from weather or , does not break the illusion, nor does damage done to a .  If the party order becomes temporarily shuffled around as Pokemon are switched out in battle, this ability chooses the last Pokemon according to that shuffled order.
